title: Hetastarch-stabilized polypyrrole with hyperthermia-enhanced release and catalytic activity for synergistic antitumor therapy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8445-8453
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08263F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiaoyun Huang, Zhiming Liu, Weijian Zeng, Xiaoyu Ma, Yu Zhang, Muye Li, Jiutong Sun, Sheng Mao, Li Bian
Biodegradable HES@CuP-D with good dispersibility has been elaborately fabricated by one-step synthesis using safety-approved hetastarch as a novel stabilizer and CuCl2 as an oxidant for hyperthermia-accelerated DOX release and -enhanced Fenton catalysis against malignant tumors.
